mapper.select: select oid,a.name,phone,a.addr,g.x_name,o.number,g.x_price,o.number*g.x_price tprice,g.xid, o.createtime,g.x_img,state,zts,fts,cjts,c.kname,tts,u.username username,u.useremail,beizhu from address a,xiangqing g,orders o,kind c,user u where o.aid = a.id and o.xid = g.xid and o.uid = u.uid and c.kid = g.xid and ordernumber = #{oid}

select oid,a.username,telephone,a.address,gname,o.numbers,g.price,o.numbers*g.price tprice,g.gid, o.cts,g.img,ostatus,zts,fts,cjts,cname,tstatus,tts,times,tips from address_info a,goods_info g,Orders o,class_info c where o.aid = a.aid and o.gid = g.gid and o.uid = #{uid} and o.dstatus = 0 and c.cid = g.cid and g.gname like #{gname} and oid like #{oid} and o.ostatus = #{ostatus} or o.ostatus = 6 or o.ostatus = 7 order by o.cts desc order by o.zts desc order by o.fts desc order by o.cjts desc order by o.cjts desc order by o.tts desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
